summary: This bill, the Abortion Data and Outreach to Unlock and Leverage Abortion Support Act (or the Abortion DOULAS Act), directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to study the benefits of abortion doula care. It defines abortion doula care, outlines findings on the support doulas provide, and mandates a study assessing the impact of doula care, data collection from those who have received it, and expert consultation. A report to Congress will detail findings, including recommendations for increasing access and policy considerations for integrating doula care into State Medicaid plans and waivers.
